kv17.1:2.3: Arahā puññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, gatisaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, bhavasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, issariyasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, adhipaccasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, mahābhogasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, mahāparivārasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, devasobhagyasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karoti, manussasobhagyasaṃvattaniyaṃ kammaṃ karotīti?
kv17.1:3.14: nanu arahā nevācināti na apacināti apacinitvā ṭhitoti?
kv17.1:3.16: Hañci arahā nevācināti nāpacināti apacinitvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.1:4.1: ☑ Nanu arahā neva pajahati na upādiyati pajahitvā ṭhito, neva visineti na ussineti visinetvā ṭhito, neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhitoti?
kv17.1:4.3: Hañci arahā neva vidhūpeti na sandhūpeti vidhūpetvā ṭhito, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.1:5.5: Hañci arahā dānaṃ dadeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.1:6.14: Hañci arahā cetiyaṃ abhidakkhiṇaṃ kareyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
